descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern on a black grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same size as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Imagine the original pattern is a 3x3 grid. What you need to do is copy the pattern in the 3x3 to the 9x9 grid. So you  have 9 3x3 grid inside of the bigger grid(Top left, top middle, top right, middle left, middle, middle right, bottom left, bottom middle, bottom right). For example if the  input pattern is a l shape you would only copy this to the top middle, middle and bottom middle grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern on a black grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same size as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Imagine the original pattern is a 3x3 grid. What you need to do is copy the pattern in the 3x3 to the 9x9 grid. So you  have 9 3x3 grid inside of the bigger grid(Top left, top middle, top right, middle left, middle, middle right, bottom left, bottom middle, bottom right). For example if the  input pattern is a l shape you would only copy this to the top middle, middle and bottom middle grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern on a black grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same size as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...imagine the original pattern is a 3x3 to the 9x9 grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one unique color and a background color with a specific shape
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...as the input grid which is 9by9 box.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...look at the pattern in which the design is structured and direction. Then follow it by creating same design in the same direction (if it is diagonally or in row). Repeat the design until it reaches the edge and more similar design on the next region until you reach each border with the design

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a colored shape on black
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... first copy the input field exactly into the output field. Now look at the shape in the input field and imagine it is placed in a 3x3 box. Note that each colored cell represent each of the 3x3 area inside of a 9x9 in the output field (top left, top center, top right, middle left, and so on). For each colored cell, copy and replicate the whole shape in the output region in the particular region.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...color grid on black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...each color grid need to change as 3x3 grid and need to copy same pattern in to each grid

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a colored shape on black
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replicate the whole shape in the output region in the particular region

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a colored pattern.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add the pattern to the middle of each side if it is purple. If it is blue, continue the pattern to the right and drop the corner pattern to next level. If it is yellow, continue the pattern the  corner of the next pattern.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one color on black background
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the shape and  make four or five times on the black background

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...colored blocks that make a shape on black.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make four of the shapes seen in the input on the output. The placement of the shapes in the output makes the grid look like the same shape as the input shape.
